attributes.action: Govern for us not dictate to us
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to remind the PM that he works for us.
If for example a petition to scrap road pricing reaches 1 million plus signatures he must take it that the people of this country DO NOT WANT THIS RULE IMPOSED AGAINST OUR WILL.
Not fob us off with some excuse and push it through anyway.
We have the votes and the ability to make a pm a distant memory take us seriously.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
